name: 胡同來
objective: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
schedule:
1.Brand Marketing Overview
2.Brands and Brand Management
3.Case Study(1)
4.Customer-Based Brand Equity 1
5.Customer-Based Brand Equity 2
6.Brand Positioning and Values 1
7.Brand Positioning and Values 2
8.Case Study(2)
9.Build Brand Equity 1
10.Build Brand Equity 2
11.Brand Equity Measurement and Management System 1
12.Brand Equity Measurement and Management System 2
13.Case Study(3)
14.Designing and Implementing Branding Strategies 1
15.Designing and Implementing Branding Strategies 2
16.Introducing and Naming New Products and Brand Extensions
17.Case Study(4)
18.Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Class Participation 10%
Home Work 20%
Case Study 30%
Final Exam 40%
materials: Keller, Kevin Lane (2007), Strategic Brand Management: Building, Measuring, and Managing Brand Equity, 3rd ed., New Jersey: Prentice Hall.
